name: LFG - The Fork of Truth
blurb: A 4-player co-op RPG based on the online comic based on RPGs. Looking for Group has come full circle! For PC, Mac and Linux.

rewards.reward: No Reward

High-Five Level - You are now part of the Eternal Thanks Tier. You will get your name in the credits under the \u201cBronze\u201d section. You will also get access to the member area of the Fork of Truth website. Download wallpapers, share your thoughts on the community forum, check out a digital map of the LFG world, and stay tuned with behind-the-scenes updates.

Early Bird Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + everything in the Eternal Thanks Tier. During beta you can play the game before the release and give us your feedback. We need your feedback as it will definitely help us improve the game. As a bonus for getting in on this, you will get $5 off!

The Game-On Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + everything in the Eternal Thanks Tier. During beta you can play the game before the release and give us your feedback. We need your feedback as it will definitely help us improve the game.

The In-Game Goodies Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier. Spice up your game with a fel-bunny companion! You\u2019ll also receive a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack (DRM), and a digital "Making of" video.

The Carson Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier. You will also receive Carson as your in-game companion! As well as a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack, and a digital "Making of" video.

The C&H Guy Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier. You will also receive C&H Guy as your in-game companion! As well as a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack, and a digital "Making of" video.

As well as a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack, and a digital "Making of" video.

The Schlock Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier. You will also receive Schlock as your in-game companion! As well as a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack, and a digital "Making of" video.

The Leo Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier. You will also receive Leo as your in-game companion! As well as a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack, and a digital "Making of" video.

The Clones Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier. You will also receive The Clones as your in-game companion! As well as a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack, and a digital "Making of" video.

The T-Rex Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier. You will also receive T-Rex as your in-game companion! As well as a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack, and a digital "Making of" video.

The Choo-Choo Bear Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier. You will also receive the elastic Choo-Choo Bear as your in-game companion! You\u2019ll also receive a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack, and a digital "Making of" video.

The Pick-Two Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier. You will be able to chose 2 characters from the available companions graphic as your in-game companions! As well as a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack, and a digital "Making of" video.

The Looking For Group Level - Receive 4 editions of the Fork of Truth, 1 for each member of your future party. When all of you are in the same party in game you\u2019ll receive the very special (read useless) buff that strengthens your bonds. You'll also get everything in the Supreme Thanks Tier.

The Monster Companion Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier. You will also receive all of the in-game companions! All of them. As well as a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack, and a digital "Making of" video.

The Physical Goodies Level - You will receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + everything in the Supreme Thanks Tier. You will get the exclusive Richard Figurine (in-game version). You will also receive the fwoosh lighter for your arsonistic needs and a exclusive Looking for Group map to set on fire! Includes shipping to US and Canada. International orders please add $30.

The Non-Gamer Level - You want all the cool Fork of Truth swag but aren't a gamer? No problem! You'll get the fwoosh lighter, exclusive map, the exclusive Richard Figurine (in-game version) and the cookie cutter. It also gets your name in the \u201cCollectors\u201d part of the credits and the \u201cCollector\u201d badge on the forums. Includes shipping to US and Canada. International orders please add $30.

Looking For An Elite Group Level - You'll receive 4 editions of the \u2018Fork of Truth Digital Special Edition\u2019 with the Supreme Thanks Tier. If you are playing with your 3 chosen companions you will get the epic group buff (none game changing) buff that strengthens your bonds of friendship.

The Box Set Level - You\u2019ll receive an exclusive limited edition the Fork of Truth boxed edition signed by the Looking for Group team. This box will also include the fwoosh lighter, exclusive map, the exclusive Richard Figurine (in-game version) and gets your name in the \u201cCollectors\u201d part of the credits and the \u201cCollector\u201d badge on the forums. Man, these rewards are starting to get crazy! Includes shipping to US and Canada. International orders please add $30.

The Lartist Level - Lar will draw you as an LFG character! This will be an original ink drawing, not digital, and will only be available during the Dickathon! You will also receive 1 Fork of Truth digital edition + early beta access + the Supreme Thanks Tier.  You\u2019ll receive a silver in-game portrait, silver forum badge and your name in the \u201cSilver\u201d part of the credits. But wait, there's more! You'll also get the digital artbook about the development process of Fork of Truth, the official soundtrack (DRM), and a digital "Making of" video.

The Fork Level - Dine in true fashion with the one and only real Fork of Truth. The fork will be engraved with a special thank-you note from Sohmer & Lar (I hope that this is possible, don't kill me if it isn't). You\u2019ll also receive an exclusive limited edition the Fork of Truth boxed edition signed by the Looking for Group team. This box will also include the fwoosh lighter, exclusive map, the exclusive Richard Figurine (in-game version) and gets your name in the \u201cCollectors\u201d part of the credits and the \u201cCollector\u201d badge on the forums. Includes shipping to US and Canada. International orders please add $30. Fork Pony!

The Junk Drop Level - Help us design and name some grey level items in the game (Sohmer has veto power)! It won't do much but everyone will see it! You will also receive everything from the Collector's Tier. Includes shipping to US and Canada. International orders please add $30.

The Blacksmith Level - Help us design and name a weapon or armour piece in the game (Sohmer has veto power)! You will receive everything from the Collector's Tier as well as Alpha access to the game, the \u201cLegendary\u201d badge on the forums and your name in the \u201cLegend\u201d part of the credits. Includes shipping to US and Canada. International orders please add $30.

The World-Builder Level - Help us design and name an in-game landmark (Sohmer has veto power)! You will receive everything from the Collector's Tier as well as Alpha access to the game, the \u201cLegendary\u201d badge on the forums and your name in the \u201cLegend\u201d part of the credits. Includes shipping to US and Canada. International orders please add $30.

The NPC Level - Help us design and name a human NPC (again, Sohmer has veto power)! You will receive all elements of the Legendary Tier as well as an invitation to the launch party, the \u201cEpic\u201d badge on the forums and your name in the \u201cEpic\u201d part of the credits. Includes shipping to US and Canada. International orders please add $30.

The Prancing Pony Level - Help us design and name an Inn or Tavern (Sohmer. Veto power. Always)! You will receive all elements of the Legendary Tier as well as an invitation to the launch party, the \u201cEpic\u201d badge on the forums and your name in the \u201cEpic\u201d part of the credits. Includes shipping to US and Canada. International orders please add $30.

The Boss Level - Help us design and name a high-level enemy (mmm veto power, Sohmer has)! You will receive all elements of the Legendary Tier as well as an invitation to the launch party, the \u201cEpic\u201d badge on the forums and your name in the \u201cEpic\u201d part of the credits. Includes shipping to US and Canada. International orders please add $30.

The Very Important Person Level - You get all the elements of 'The Blacksmith Level', 'The World-Builder Level', 'The NPC Level', 'The Prancing Pony Level ', and 'The Boss Level'. You will also get a VIP invite to the launch party and dinner with the team!

The Executive Producer Level - You get all the elements of 'The Very Important Person Level' as well as credit as an executive producer. You will get to sit in on Skype meetings between Sohmer and Paladin Studios and be the first to know everything about the game's progress.
